raw_text:
Contains self generated alcohol not more than 6%v/v

Dose : 1 measuring cup (7ml) Hempushpa with 1
tablet Hemtab twice a day with water or as
directed by the physician.

मात्रा : 1 मापक (7 मि.लि.) हेमपुष्प्या तथा 1 गोली हेमटेब दिन में
दो बार पानी के साथ या चिकित्सक के निर्देशानुसार

Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
SHAKE WELL BEFORE USE

dosage_instructions.english: 1 measuring cup (7ml) Hempushpa with 1 tablet Hemtab twice a day with water or as directed by the physician
dosage_instructions.hindi: 1 मापक (7 मि.लि.) हेमपुष्प्या तथा 1 गोली हेमटेब दिन में दो बार पानी के साथ या चिकित्सक के निर्देशानुसार

structured_data.storage_conditions: Store in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight.
